article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives Aegis Contract Modification
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems and Training, Moorestown, N.J., is being awarded a $48,817,610 modification to previously awarded contract (N00024-13-C-5132) to exercise options for technical engineering, configuration management, associated equipment/supplies, quality assurance, information assurance, and other operation and maintenance efforts required for the Aegis development and test sites, including the Combat Systems Engineering Development Site, SPY-1A Test Facility, and the Naval Systems Computing Center. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
